code: import{useEffect}from'react';import{ContactForm}from'./ContactForm/ContactForm';import{Filter}from'./Filter/Filter';import{ContactList}from'./ContactList/ContactList';import css from'./ContactForm/ContactForm.module.css';import{addContact,deleteContact}from'../redux/slices/contactsSlice';import{setFilter}from'../redux/slices/filterSlice';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{selectContacts,selectFilters}from'../redux/selectors/selectors';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var App=function App(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var _useSelector=useSelector(selectContacts),contacts=_useSelector.contacts;var _useSelector2=useSelector(selectFilters),filter=_useSelector2.filter;useEffect(function(){localStorage.setItem('contactList',JSON.stringify(contacts));},[contacts]);var handleChange=function handleChange(e){var value=e.target.value;dispatch(setFilter({filter:value}));};var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(e){var name=e.name;var number=e.number;dispatch(addContact({name:name,number:number}));};var handleDelete=function handleDelete(id){dispatch(deleteContact({id:id}));};var getFilteredContacts=function getFilteredContacts(){var filteredContactList=contacts.filter(function(contact){return contact.name.toLowerCase().includes(filter.toLowerCase());});return filteredContactList;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{height:'100%',width:'70%',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',color:'#000000',background:'#b74848',margin:'auto',padding:20,borderRadius:30},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:css.header,children:"Phonebook"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactForm,{handleSubmit:handleSubmit}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:css.contacts,children:"Contacts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filter,{filter:filter,handleChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactList,{contacts:getFilteredContacts(),handleDelete:handleDelete})]});};export default App;
